attractions.title: USS Midway Museum
attractions.description: Life-at-sea exhibits, restored planes & flight simulators aboard this legendary aircraft carrier.
attractions.address: 910 N Harbor Dr, San Diego, CA 92101

attractions.title: Maritime Museum of San Diego
attractions.description: Waterfront venue showcasing many types of restored vintage ships & historical exhibits.
attractions.address: 1492 N Harbor Dr, San Diego, CA 92101

attractions.title: San Diego Air & Space Museum
attractions.description: Popular place with historical aircraft/spacecraft & interactive exhibits, plus a gift shop & grill.
attractions.address: 2001 Pan American Plaza, San Diego, CA 92101

attractions.title: San Diego Model Railroad Museum
attractions.description: Kid-friendly museum featuring many working scale models of California rail lines & landscapes.
attractions.address: 1649 El Prado Modern and Contemporary Art and Dynamic, San Diego, CA 92101

attractions.title: California Tower in Museum of Man
attractions.address: California Tower, 1350 El Prado, San Diego, CA 92101
